RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Agent Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: Agent who testified about his uncertainty regarding the arrest of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., but whose actions were deemed to be based on probable cause.
Defendant involved in a human smuggling case, subjected to a de facto arrest by Agent Benavides, which was deemed warranted due to probable cause.
